SEARCH
Package au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath.evaluation

Class SingleResourceEvaluator

java.lang.Object
au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath.evaluation.SingleResourceEvaluator
public class SingleResourceEvaluator extends Object
Evaluates FHIRPath expressions against a single FHIR resource type without requiring a DataSource.

This evaluator produces Collection objects containing Spark SQL Column expressions that can be applied to datasets. Unlike dataset-aware evaluators, this evaluator does not require access to actual data and cannot create dataset views.

It uses a ResourceResolver for resource resolution and handles cross-resource references according to the configured CrossResourceStrategy.

Use this evaluator when:

  • Building filter expressions for later application to datasets
  • Generating Column expressions from FHIRPath without executing queries
  • Working with single-resource scenarios that don't need cross-resource joins

Use SingleResourceEvaluatorBuilder to create instances for standard FHIR resources, or use of(ResourceResolver, FunctionRegistry, Map) for custom resource resolvers.

See Also:

  • Method Details

    • of

      @Nonnull public static SingleResourceEvaluator of(@Nonnull ResourceResolver resolver, @Nonnull FunctionRegistry functionRegistry, @Nonnull Map<String,Collection> variables)
      Creates a new SingleResourceEvaluator with the specified resolver.

      This factory method allows creating evaluators with custom resource resolvers, such as DefinitionResourceResolver for arbitrary data structures.

      Parameters:
      resolver - the resource resolver to use
      functionRegistry - the function registry for resolving FHIRPath functions
      variables - additional variables available during evaluation
      Returns:
      a new SingleResourceEvaluator instance

    • evaluate

      @Nonnull public Collection evaluate(@Nonnull FhirPath fhirPath)
      Evaluates a FHIRPath expression with the default input context.

      The default input context is the subject resource, equivalent to calling evaluate(FhirPath, Collection) with the subject resource collection.

      Parameters:
      fhirPath - the FHIRPath expression to evaluate
      Returns:
      the result of the evaluation as a Collection

    • evaluate

      @Nonnull public Collection evaluate(@Nonnull FhirPath fhirPath, @Nonnull Collection inputContext)
      Evaluates a FHIRPath expression with a custom input context.

      The input context is the collection that the FHIRPath expression operates on. This is typically used when evaluating expressions in the context of a specific element rather than the resource root.

      Parameters:
      fhirPath - the FHIRPath expression to evaluate
      inputContext - the input context collection to evaluate against
      Returns:
      the result of the evaluation as a Collection

    • getSubjectResourceCode

      @Nonnull public String getSubjectResourceCode()
      Returns the subject resource code for this evaluator.

      This method supports both standard FHIR resource types (e.g., "Patient", "Observation") and custom resource types (e.g., "ViewDefinition").

      Returns:
      the subject resource type code

    • getDefaultInputContext

      @Nonnull public ResourceCollection getDefaultInputContext()
      Returns the default input context (subject resource collection).

      This is the initial input context used when evaluating FHIRPath expressions that start from the resource root. The returned ResourceCollection represents the subject resource type for this evaluator.

      Returns:
      the subject resource collection
